response.overview: An aged Charlie Chaplin narrates his life to his autobiography's editor, including his rise to wealth and comedic fame from poverty, his turbulent personal life and his run-ins with the FBI.
response.tagline: Everyone has a wild side. Even a legend.
response.title: Chaplin

results.name: The Art Of The Casting Director: Casting “Chaplin” and “One Flew Over The Cuckoo’s Nest”
